Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function swap_directions_to_polish() for k, v in pairs(speedWalkDir) do if v == "u" then speedWalkDir[k] = "gora" elseif v == "d" then speedWalkDir[k] = "dol" end --if
end --for end --func
function speedwalk_warlock(id) if global_concated_directions == nil then global_concated_directions = "" else global_concated_directions = "" end --if local token = tostring(id) if getPath(currentRoom.id, token) then swap_directions_to_polish() -- speedWalkDir should be already filled correctly for k, v in pairs(speedWalkDir)do global_concated_directions = global_concated_directions .. ", " .. v end --for speedwalk(global_concated_directions, false, 0.1) else echo("\n speedwalk niemozliwy \n") end --if end --func
